title: The Coven
description: This haunting series follows the thrilling cases of FBI agents Carina Keel and Jon Canopus as they hunt demons, witches, fallen angels and battle the supernatural. Finding a way into Limbo to rescue her father is proving a more difficult task than Carina Keel originally thought. Forced to help ‘The Coven’, Canopus and Keel find themselves in Brooklyn, New York on a quest to break out a convicted serial killer from Red Hook Asylum and to destroy a dangerous Baba Yaga witch that has set up camp in Prospect Park. But can a coven of witches truly be trusted? And why are they intent on collecting as many supernatural creatures as they can find?
author: Stephen Jarrett
